title: John Highet
text:
John James Inglis Highet (3 July 1886 – 3 May 1950) was a Scottish amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="outside%20right">outside right</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>.
Personal life.
Highet's father was <a href="Scotland%20national%20football%20team">Scottish</a> international footballer <a href="Thomas%20Highet">Thomas Highet</a>. He served as a <a href="second%20lieutenant">second lieutenant</a> in the <a href="Machine%20Gun%20Corps">Machine Gun Corps</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
